abstract: Baseball Roundup; San Francisco Giants beat Oakland Athletics, 2-1; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Madison Bumgarner hit a home run and pitched seven innings for his third consecutive win, powering the host San Francisco Giants past the Oakland Athletics, 2-1, on Saturday.

headline.main: Bumgarner Yields a Run but Makes Up the Difference in a Giants Victory
headline.print_headline: Bumgarner Yields a Run but Makes Up the Difference in a Giants Victory

snippet: Madison Bumgarner hit a home run and pitched seven innings for his third consecutive win, powering the host San Francisco Giants past the Oakland Athletics, 2-1, on Saturday.
